content.p: Postdoctoral Research Fellow, My recent research is related to medical image analysis. the main areas of interest are but are not limited to, Computer vision, Image processing, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Neural networks. The current research focused on breast cancer segmentation and classification using Histopathological images based on Convolution neural networks. in addition to analysis of immune cell spatial distribution in relation to the tumor cells distribution telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
